name: Astro Michi
description:
Astro Michi
		Before humans reached outer space, many animals were used as an experiment




		Help the cat to scape back to Earth!
		
		Fight monsters and sum points
		
			




		
		Survive to 44 differents levels
		
		Don't get damage or the helmet will crack and break!
		
			

		
		Find dead Astro Cats to change your cracked helmet
		
			

		
		Fight against different creatures
		
			









		
		Use your light to get in caves
		
			






		
		Find the way to continue!
		
			




		Fight the Big Monsters!
		
			


Find all mini portals to unlock an alternative ending
		
		Discover the secret of mysterious aliens
